{T}: Add {W}, {B}, or {G} to your mana pool.

text:

• Exile target creature with power 3 or greater.

flavor:
"The Sultai take our dead, so we shall take their living!"
—Taklai, Mardu ragesinger
name: Act of Treason

flavor: "Hold the line, for family and the fallen!"

First strike

flavor: The appearance of a kirin signifies the passing or arrival of an important figure. As word of sightings spread, all the khans took it to mean themselves. Only the shaman Chianul thought of Sarkhan Vol.
name: Alabaster Kirin
text: Flying, vigilance

flavor: The Temur welcome bears into the clan, fighting alongside them in battle. The relationship dates back to when they labored side by side under Sultai rule.

flavor: Supplicants offer flesh and silver, flowers and blood. The altar takes what it will, eyes gleaming with unspoken promises.
name: Altar of the Brood
text: Whenever another permanent enters the battlefield under your control, each opponent puts the top card of his or her library into his or her graveyard.

flavor: Rarely at rest on the Amber Throne, Anafenza always leads the Abzan Houses to battle.

text:
Whenever Anafenza, the Foremost attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on another target tapped creature you control.
If a creature card would be put into an opponent's graveyard from anywhere, exile it instead.

flavor: The stature of the fighter matters less than the depth of the cut.
name: Ankle Shanker
text:
Haste
Whenever Ankle Shanker attacks, creatures you control gain first strike and deathtouch until end of turn.

flavor: Lightning burns its own path.
name: Arc Lightning
text: Arc Lightning deals 3 damage divided as you choose among one, two, or three target creatures and/or players.

flavor: Every shaft is graven with a name from a kin tree, calling upon the spirits of the ancestors to make it fly true.
name: Archers' Parapet
text:
Defender
{1}{B}, {T}: Each opponent loses 1 life.

flavor: The Abzan avoid extended supply lines by incorporating weapons stores into their battle formations.
name: Armament Corps

flavor: First the thunder, then the rain.
name: Arrow Storm

Arrow Storm deals 4 damage to target creature or player.

flavor:
"Hold the high ground, then bring it to your enemy."
—Surrak, khan of the Temur

text: Whenever Avalanche Tusker attacks, target creature defending player controls blocks it this combat if able.

flavor: When Temur warriors enter the battle trance known as "awakening the bear," they lose all sense of enemy or friend, seeing only threats to the wilderness.

Raid — War-Name Aspirant enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it if you attacked with a creature this turn.
War-Name Aspirant can't be blocked by creatures with power 1 or less.

flavor: The wardens guard the sacred documents of Tarkir's history, though they are forbidden to read the words.
name: Warden of the Eye
text: When Warden of the Eye enters the battlefield, return target noncreature, nonland card from your graveyard to your hand.

name: Watcher of the Roost
text:
Flying
Morph—Reveal a white card in your hand. (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Watcher of the Roost is turned face up, you gain 2 life.

flavor:
"Be as water: untamed and unheld, yet inexorably flowing toward a greater goal."
—Shensu, Riverwheel mystic
name: Waterwhirl
text: Return up to two target creatures to their owners' hands.

flavor: Temur shamans speak of three destinies: the now, the echo of the past, and the unwritten. They find flickering paths among tangled possibilities.
name: Weave Fate
text: Draw two cards.

flavor: As a test of calm and compassion, a Jeskai monk softly approaches a grazing sambar and offers it a lotus from his or her hand. If the creature eats, the student ascends to the next level of training.
name: Wetland Sambar
Whirlwind Adept
text:
Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)

name: Wind-Scarred Crag
text:
Wind-Scarred Crag enters the battlefield tapped.
When Wind-Scarred Crag enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.
{T}: Add {R} or {W} to your mana pool.

flavor:
"When the last dragon fell, its spirit escaped as a roar into the wind."
—Temur tale
name: Windstorm
text: Windstorm deals X damage to each creature with flying.

flavor: Where dragons once roared, their bones now keen.
name: Windswept Heath
text: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Windswept Heath: Search your library for a Forest or Plains card and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

name: Wingmate Roc
text:
Flying
Raid — When Wingmate Roc enters the battlefield, if you attacked with a creature this turn, put a 3/4 white Bird creature token with flying onto the battlefield.
Whenever Wingmate Roc attacks, you gain 1 life for each attacking creature.

flavor:
"The mountains scream with the dragons' throats."
—Chianul, Who Whispers Twice
name: Winterflame
text:
Choose one or both —
• Tap target creature.
• Winterflame deals 2 damage to target creature.

flavor: It strode through the clash of dragons, the fall of Ugin, and the rise of the khans.
name: Witness of the Ages
text: Morph {5} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

flavor: Where dragons' breath once burned, their bones now freeze.
name: Wooded Foothills
text: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Wooded Foothills: Search your library for a Mountain or Forest card and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

flavor: Even among the hardiest warriors of the Temur, loxodons are respected for their adaptation to the mountain snows.
name: Woolly Loxodon
text: Morph {5}{G} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

name: Zurgo Helmsmasher
text:
Haste
Zurgo Helmsmasher attacks each combat if able.
Zurgo Helmsmasher has indestructible as long as it's your turn.
Whenever a creature dealt damage by Zurgo Helmsmasher this turn dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Zurgo Helmsmasher.
